label: Pipefy
description: Actions for interacting with Salesforce Objects and the Salesforce API
GetACardByID.session.label: Session Name
GetACardByID.pipefyToken.label: Pipefy Token
GetACardByID.cardID.label: Card ID
GetACardByID.cardID.description: ID of the card being searched
GetACardByID.label: Get a Card By ID
GetACardByID.description: Gets the information of the card by the ID inserted
GetACardByID.return_description: Returns the content of the card in JSON format. Use the JSON package to query your JSON structure.
CreateCard.label: Create Card
CreateCard.description: Creates a card for a Pipe based on the dictionary inserted and the Pipe's ID
CreateCard.session.label: Session Name
CreateCard.pipefyToken.label: Pipefy Token
CreateCard.pipeID.label: Pipe ID
CreateCard.pipeID.description: Pipe ID of the Pipe to create a card in
CreateCard.cardFields.label: Cards Fields
CreateCard.cardFields.description: Dictionary with the fields and values to create a card in Pipefy
CreateRecord.label: Create Record
CreateRecord.description: Creates a record for a Database based on the dictionary inserted and the Database's ID
CreateRecord.session.label: Session Name
CreateRecord.pipefyToken.label: Pipefy Token
CreateRecord.tableID.label: Database ID
CreateRecord.tableID.description: Database ID of the Database to create a record in
CreateRecord.recordFields.label: Record's Fields
CreateRecord.recordFields.description: Dictionary with the fields and values to create a record in Pipefy
CustomQuery.session.label: Session Name
CustomQuery.pipefyToken.label: Pipefy Token
CustomQuery.customQueryInput.label: Custom Query
CustomQuery.label: Send Custom Query
CustomQuery.return_description: Returns the content of the query in JSON format. Use the JSON package to query your JSON structure.
